data.name: Robotpencil Presents: Basic Render Tips - Matte and Metal
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

This video tutorial mainly talks about how to handle MATTE and METAL materials using some simple tricks and tips I use on a daily basis. This is for those who are more intermediate and have control of their paintings, but not their materials. You should refer to the Painting with Confidence video (Coming Soon to Steam) if you are a super beginner, before this video.

Topics Covered
  • Capturing the shape
  • Picking a light source
  • Adding Spec

Included
  • Tool Presets
  • Hi-RES PSD, JPEG Files

data.short_description: This video tutorial mainly talks about how to handle MATTE and METAL materials using some simple tricks and tips I use on a daily basis. This is for those who are more intermediate and have control of their paintings, but not their materials.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
